Please provide the following information to aid in adding your group to the directory:

### Esssential

- [ ] Group URL (Web address)
      https://www.facebook.com/groups/free.code.camp.bridgeport.ct
- [ ] Town or City group is located in
      Bridgeport
- [ ] State / County / Region
      CT
- [ ] Country
      USA

### Nice to have

- [ ] Co-ordinates

### If you have one

- [ ] URL of Group Photo
